body.p: This is a list of the known issues as of the release of version (). Please verify that any new problem found is not in this list before sending a bug report.

item.text: There are currently no known issues.

body.p: This is a list of the currently known suggested improvements.

item.title: Support strict SNMPv1 and SNMPv2 parsing
item.text: When parsing SNMPv1 files, no symbols or constructs from SNMPv2 should be available. The opposite goes for SNMPv2 files. (Bug #4367)

item.title: Create unit tests
item.text: All the source code should be tested automatically through JUnit or a similar tool. This is a minor issue, however, as the complete library is always tested with all the IETF MIB files on each build. (Bug #4368)
